utterance.content: Ohhh. Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, honey! This is the best thing that has ever happened to you. Rejection is the bedrock of a great acting career. Until an actor has suffered, he hasn't really lived.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Thanks, Gram.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: You're welcome. And besides, auditions are like men. There's another one right around the corner.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where are you going?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Oh, we need ice cream to ease the pain, stat. I'm going to the corner store.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I'm sorry, sweetie.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Can I admit something?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Always.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Going up against Kelly made me realize I didn't really want the part. I could see how hungry she was, and I didn't want to disappoint Gram, but I don't love it the way she does.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, maybe it's not in your bones, as Gram would say. I am proud of you for trying.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Thanks, Dad. And there's a silver lining. After the announcement, the drama teacher offered me stage manager. It's way more my style, and I get to keep all my after school clubs.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My little overachiever. Well, congratulations on not getting the part.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Mmm, smells good.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Come help me. Wash up. So, you need to chop these up...
